title: Bedroom Available in heart of Williamsburg
posting_body: ['**The apartment is being deep cleaned and spackled/re-painted, all the images were taken beforehand.', '**', 'Two bedroom with large living room/kitchen.', "Your room would be 11.5' x 11.5' with built in shelving unit and ensuite master bathroom (11.5' x 6.6').", 'Lots of natural light in the room and bathroom, with direct access to the shared outdoor space (which is also getting re-vamped).', ' There is also a closet in the hallway for winter/clothes suitcases, and storage in the basement along with a washer/dryer.', 'Heat included.', 'Electricity and Wifi is split.', 'I am looking for a very clean, responsible roommate who works full time.', 'The ideal roommate is someone who respects personal space and downtime, but is also down to hang in the living room.', 'Not looking for someone who likes to host parties.', 'I work in the design industry and am very particular about the interior layout of my space, so ideally someone who is interested/cares about aesthetics and neatness as well.', 'Must be okay living with a cute small dog :)', "Showing the apartment Sunday August 7th, please get in touch if you'd like to see it."]
